text_logic_form: The line $BC$ is the base of the isosceles triangle $ABC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $BC$ is the base of the isosceles triangle $ABC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BA$ is $2x+4$ units.
The length of the line $CA$ is $3x-1$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $4x-8$ units.
line_instances: There are lines $BA$, $BC$, and $CA$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
